TopicTitle: How much do used LEGO Mindstorms EV3 parts sell for?

Articles.Content: I have had a LEGO Mindstorms EV3 kit for a couple years, and I think it is time to sell it so I can move on to greater things. I was just wondering, what is a reasonable price for the parts? I will probably sell only the computer brick, the motors and the sensors, since many of the Technic pieces have been lost.
